channel.title: Quick random thought about wtf contact requests
channel.description: [originally posted at facebook][1] Have you ever received a "friend request" from someone who you have no clue where they came from and they don't introduce themselves? I've got quite some of those. I decided imma gonna answer 'em with random wtf images from google, such as this: [1]: https://www.facebook.com/caue.rego/posts/10152571047590868
